events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your background and skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact during the hiring process.
Thank you for attending the initial screening. We appreciate your technical knowledge and experience.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and is eager to proceed to the next interview stage.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 8th at 3 PM, which will focus on software development and problem-solving skills.
Your technical interview was completed successfully. The panel was impressed with your coding abilities and system design knowledge.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 11th at 10 AM to discuss company culture and your career aspirations.
The HR interview went very well, and we are pleased with your fit for the team and alignment with our values.
We are excited to extend you an official job offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome them onboard.
Onboarding has begun, including orientation sessions and setup of necessary development tools and access permissions.
The hiring process is now complete. The new engineer has been successfully integrated into the development team.
